title: Effective Public Speaking Skills
headline: Learn the art of delivering effective public speeches with confidence in this free online public speaking course.
description: The benefit of public speaking runs across different sectors of the economy, including the business sector. As a public speaker, you have a message. Your goal is to deliver good content to the right audience. Passing inappropriate content to the audience defeats the essence of public speaking. This course will teach you how to craft and deliver well-articulated messages with magnetic impact to make sure your audience hangs on every word.

courseDescription:
The art of public speaking is a skill that ensures the free flow of excellent content that passes across a message to an audience. However, to become a successful public speaker, you have to be professionally trained, passionate, knowledgeable on the particular topic you want to communicate and have the right audience for your subject. Discover how to compose and deliver a well-crafted message to your target audience in the most memorable ways. Then learn how to use your message to transform lives, elevate your audience and generate business leads. Unfortunately, the fear of public speaking has prevented many talented businesses from being discovered. In this course, we teach you how to conquer the fear of public speaking by systematically replacing each letter of ‘fear’ with positive words that will get you in front of your audience feeling excited about delivering a speech.

If you want to persuade your listeners to buy from you, you need to uncover what they want and give it to them. Analyze how to find out what they want and develop a business showcase. Create a five-minute speech that outlines your business or product and attracts new clients using a proven formula. Add great content and useful tips and techniques to make it a value-added message. Our world today is a visual one. Speaking time is rapidly getting shorter and shorter by the day. Therefore, as a business owner, you need to have a five-minute speech that you can employ when you only have a few minutes to speak. Learn to make your concise delivery impactful by being memorable.

If you want to achieve the best results from your speaking efforts, you must abide by specific rules. Do you know the seven rules of public speaking? Investigate the practices of successful orators to enable you to apply each of these rules in your presentation. The benefits of public speaking are too many to overlook. This course teaches you how to define a market and niche, goes through rehearsal techniques to improve your public speaking as you develop cues to trigger topics rather than writing scripts. Change lives with your words by enrolling in this course today!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn the elements of a good message, how to craft and deliver an impactful message to your target audience. You will learn how to generate leads and generally grow your business through public speaking. Then you will learn how to conquer the fear of public speaking by adopting a positive mindset towards public speaking.
topics: Introduction to Public Speaking - Learning Outcomes
Conquering the Fear of Public Speaking
Introduction to Public Speaking - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn tips for effective public speaking for business development and growth, the importance of training for public speaking, how to select a topic that you are passionate and knowledgeable about for the right audience, and how to start off on a note that will have your audience's attention fully wrapped in you.
topics: Public Speaking for Business Development - Learning Outcomes
Public Speaking to Reach New Heights
Effective Speaking for Business Owners - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Creating a Business Showcase and Rules
modules.description: In this module, you will learn how to move your audience to take action by giving a heartfelt speech, creating opportunities for audience participation, appreciating your audience and ending each presentation with a memorable statement. You will also learn the rules of public speaking and how to apply them for effective public speaking delivery.
topics: Creating a Business Showcase and Rules - Learning Outcomes
Creating a Business Showcase and Rules - Lesson Summary

  • Conquering the Fear of Public Speaking

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Lesson Summary

    • As a public speaker, you have a message to share that only you can share with people that can only hear it from you.
    • Your message has the potential of saving someone's business, life, or soul. It is your duty to share it.
    • Sharing your message with your target market will produce the best results. 
    • Before you step on any stage it is important to get trained as a public speaker.
    • People want a transformation that will create permanent change in their life. As a speaker and leader, it is critical to provide your audience with a way they can get the transformation they seek.
    • Overcoming the fear of public speaking requires speaking more often, being excited, thinking more about the audience, rehearsing, and using a system to develop your point.
    • Your responsibility as a speaker is to elevate your audience and make them feel better after your presentation.
    • When crafted and delivered properly, your message will generate an endless flow of leads, prospects, and clients. 
    • Public speaking works as a marketing strategy that you use to build your business fast.
    • Stories act as invisible selling, they suspend time and open the heart of the listeners.
    • Public speaking works to get clients because it positions you as an expert in your field even before you show up to speak.

  •  Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Explain how to use public speaking as a marketing strategy for your business.
    • Recognize public speaking tips specifically designed for business owners.
    • Describe the art of persuasion and influence your audience.
    • Discuss how to use public speaking to generate leads.
    • Identify how to keep up with the new trends about your audience.
    • Recognize how to motivate your audience to take action and buy from you.

  • Public Speaking to Reach New Heights

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Lesson Summary

    • Public speaking is a great way for business owners and entrepreneurs to showcase their business, gain visibility in their market, and attract more clients. 
    • If you want to be a great public speaker you need to respect public speaking and get trained by a professional speaking coach. 
    •  Select a topic that you are passionate about, knowledgeable about, and that has an audience who wants to hear it.
    •  If you want your audience to buy from you it is imperative that you build trust and rapport with them throughout your presentation.
    • If you want to persuade your audience to buy from you, you need to find out what they want and give it to them.
    • Customize your content to fit your audience and deliver information specifically for them. 
    • Deliver the best content you have and keep it up-to-date. Be the first to share the latest and greatest trends in your industry.
    • There are several stories you must add to your speech in order to connect to your audience and persuade them to buy your products and services.
    • Motivating your audience to take action is imperative in any speech because this is what will get you business and make your money.

  • Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Explain how to prepare a short 5-minute business speech that showcases your business.
    • Identify how to take your brief speech to last a long time by being memorable.
    • Outline the seven rules of public speaking.
    • Recognize how to comply with the seven rules of public speaking.
    • Identify the four stories you need to have in your speech.

  • How to Create a Killer Elevator Speech

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Lesson Summary

    • You have three seconds to grab your audience's attention. Start your showcase with a powerful attention-grabbing statement.
    • Use your business elevator pitch to introduce yourself and your business.
    • Earn the right to be speaking by sharing a short story about yourself and how you got into the business you are in.
    • Whatever time you are given to speak, honor that time and stick to it.
    • Build trust and rapport within the first five minutes of your presentation. Call people by their name, say please, and thank you.
    •  Give the right amount of content for the right amount of time.
    • Give your audience multiple experiences throughout your presentation by getting them physically and mentally involved.
    • The call to action or invitation is the life-changing and revenue-generating piece of your speech. 
    • Share your name, credentials, title, and your company name to build credibility as an expert in your field.
    • Add great content such as tips and techniques. This will prevent your showcase from sounding like a commercial for your business and become a value-added message.
    • Invite your audience to take action at the end of your five minute showcase.
